title: Anime Defenders Tier List
description: Discover the most powerful Anime Defenders in Roblox with this detailed tier list. From S Tier to C Tier, we rank the best characters based on their strength and abilities.
heading: Anime Defenders Tier List
introText: Discover the most powerful Anime Defenders in Roblox with this detailed tier list. From S Tier to C Tier, we rank the best characters based on their strength and abilities.

data.itemDescription: Legion Assassin Master is a hybrid unit with solid AoE and DPS. Plus, he is a support that buffs other units’ crit chance by 30%, which is insane

The Demon Overlord is one of the easiest secrets to get and one of the best bleed units in the game, with a massive full AoE attack. Plus, he can buff other bleed units like Bear King and Curse Prince
SJW summons enemies he killed with 1/4 HP and has really cheap upgrades, making him capable of solo carrying you through most game content
Solar Overlord takes time to ramp up, but once he does, he becomes one of the best burn units in Anime Defenders. Still, others, like the Dragon Mage, outperform it by a lot on short modes

Skull Vindicator has a huge line AoE attack that channels for most of its cooldown, making his SPA significantly lower than indicated by his stats. His high DPS, extremely high range, and four placement count make him a pretty solid ground unit
Legion Veteran (Max) is a support that can buff other units’ range and deal solid damage in a wide AoE. However, he’s not as good as secrets or other exclusive units regarding DPS
Hakari is a unit with an amazing range and huge AoE. However, he can only target the ground, and his DPS is meh
Expert Sharpshooter is an okayish hill unit with an active that can really help with bosses. However, it isn’t enough to make her more viable than any of the meta hybrid units
Crimson Demon Ninja is Natsu you got off of Temu. Both his base and DoT DPSs are lower. Still, he isn’t as bad as Ant King or Esper
Celestial Qi Master is a pretty respectable full AoE DPS mythic. Consider it a much better version of Carp/Elf that can compete with other meta mythics
Champion Marksman is pretty underwhelming, both evo and unevo. However, it is a bit better than Blazing Soulmaster, as it’s a hybrid and has a better range
Darkness King has a massive full AoE attack when fully upgraded. However, his overall DPS is relatively low compared to other top-tier secrets, and he doesn’t offer any other utility

Overall, Slime Spirit Queen might be among the weakest secrets in Anime Defenders. Its DPS and utility are just not enough to make it worth getting. The only thing inflating its price is the fact that it’s so rare

Pink Demon Mage is basically an alternative version of Pink Rockstar. She slows enemies in a wide range, can deal damage, and farms gold. However, the gold farm is really lacking compared to Pink Rockstar
Bear King (Unlocked) is a hybrid, bleed, full AoE unit that is still among the more solid mythics in Anime Defenders. Use him together with The Demon Lord to make the most out of him
Blazing Grandmaster has a line AoE attack when fully upgraded that deals somewhat respectable damage. However, most other end-game units outperform it by a large margin
Warrior Queen is a full AoE map-wipe unit. I wouldn’t consider her absolute meta because, besides damage, she doesn’t offer much. Still, she is good as a replacement for Elf/Carp
Even though he can only target ground, Giyu is fairly strong. He has a massive AoE attack, relatively low SPA, and high base damage. However, the lack of utility cripples him
Even when evolved, Queen Swordmaster is still fairly underwhelming. Her lack of utility and no full AoE are just crippling. However, she is cheap to upgrade and place, making her solid as a starter
Bionic Machine (Full Power) is a fairly mediocre hill DPS that has okay burn and extra crit on his passive. However, there are so many other mythics that outperform it
